snippet: A man who fatally shot seven people in February in Tyrone before killing himself had a blood-alcohol level three times the legal limit, the authorities said Wednesday.
abstract: Authorities say Joseph Jesse Aldridge had blood-alcohol level three times legal limit when he fatally shot seven people and killed himself in Tyrone, Mo, in February.
lead_paragraph: A man who fatally shot seven people in February in Tyrone before killing himself had a blood-alcohol level three times the legal limit, the authorities said Wednesday.

headline.main: Missouri: Killer of 7 Was Highly Intoxicated
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Killer of 7 Was Highly Intoxicated
